comment: One of the best professor I have ever taken. Would take her again anytime.

LOVED having Krista as my professor for 3D. The projects were actually really fun and even though they were challenging, she was always there to help. My final project was going horribblleee and she helped me come up with a new idea and even brought some supplies to help me complete it. Very caring and fun. Take her, you won't regret it.

I took her 3D Design class and it actually completely changed my mind about sculpture. Her projects were clear to understand and not too difficult. She really encouraged me to develop my own style and was always happy to help. I really loved this class and want to take more classes with her soon.

I've had Krista for three studio classes (2-D, Drawing 1, and 3-D) and she's been amazing for all of them! She gives very good and specific feedback and genuinely wants you to succeed and grow. Her classes are super easy to ace as long as you do your best, participate, and submit things on time.

Krista was an amazing teacher (2D and Drawing 1)! Grades were very easy to get; she didn't care as much about skill as long as you were participating in class. Her feedback was also useful and she clearly cares about students' individual skills and progress in the class as well as pushing us to be creative instead of just following guidelines.

Loveeddd taking Krista's classes (2D and Drawing I)!! Projects were interesting, workload was manageable, and she was considerate of personal issues. Just show up and get the work done on time and you literally can't fail!
